title: Screen Rant: Movie News, Movie Reviews, Movie Trailers, TV News
description: All the latest movie news, movie trailers & reviews - and the same for TV, too.

p: The Knuckles TV show is out now, and here is every reference that the series makes to the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise and SEGA as a whole.
Resident Alien showrunner Chris Sheridan has recently discussed his plans for a potential season 4, and he has some interesting changes in mind.
Intelligent, funny dialogue makes comedy much more layered and interesting, and this means that witty TV shows are the best to rewatch multiple times.
One line from Walton Goggins' The Ghoul in Prime Video's Fallout show effectively illustrated the experience of playing a game in the franchise.
The two NCIS season finales coming to CBS on Monday, May 6, have significant implications for the franchise after the cancellation of NCIS: Hawai'i.
Adult Swim officially drops a new My Adventures with Superman season 2 trailer while also finally announcing the release date for the DC TV show.
DSTLRY has launched its online marketplace dedicated to digital collecting — that still prioritizes creator rights. Screen Rant has all the details!
Exclusive: Screen Rant debuts a clip from Under the Bridge episode 4 that showcases a key moment in Reena Virk’s relationship with Josephine Bell.
Exclusive: A clip for X-Men '97 season 1, episode 8, showcases Cyclops, Cable, and Jean Grey going on a rare family road trip in the form of a battle.
Ian Fleming's James Bond novels have inspired a multi-billion-dollar film franchise, but not all of his books are of the same quality.
New footage shows a massive balloon version of Aunt Marge as featured in Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban floating near Tower Bridge.
A short Bridgerton season 3 teaser video confirms that Francesca will experience some struggles during her upcoming debut in the ton's social scene.
Billie Lourd, Star Wars actress and daughter of the iconic Carrie Fisher, is curating a Star Wars merchandise collection on eBay you can't miss.
A churro scene between Mike Faist's Art and Josh O'Connor's Patrick is one of the most talked about moments in Challengers, but what does it mean?
Zordon gave the Power Rangers three rules to abide by when he recruited them, but ignoring the most important one may doom them all forever.
Sydney Sweeney and Glen Powell's Anyone but You is a rom-com hit, and the romantic relationship within the movie justifies the movie's R-rating.
Denzel Washington offered his co-star Ethan Hawke great advice after he lost out on the Best Supporting Actor Oscar for the drama Training Day.
Captain America: Brave New World may be the best opportunity for Marvel Studios to address one of the MCU's Phase 5's most controversial storylines.
Kashi, also known as Kashina and played by Cheech Manohar, wears many rings and is the most mysterious character in Dead Boy Detectives season 1.
NBC releases a new synopsis for Chicago Fire season 12, which teases a major divorce just before the shortened One Chicago years wraps up.
Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes director Wes Ball confirms the movie will have a special home release cut that features motion capture without apes.
George Lucas is the creative mind behind Star Wars, but he didn't come up with everything; in fact, 'lightsabers' may be attributed to someone else.
Exclusive: Screen Rant debuts a thrilling new trailer and story details and reveals the US release date for The Lazarus Project season 2.
The reveal of Himawari as Kurama's new Jinchuriki could be setting her up to become stronger than her father was during the beginning of Naruto.
h3:
